00030 class ForeignKeyInfo {
00031 
00032     private $name;
00033     private $references = array();
00034 
00039     protected $vendorSpecificInfo = array();
00040 
00041 
00042     const NONE       = "";            // No "ON [ DELETE | UPDATE]" behaviour specified.
00043     const NOACTION   = "NO ACTION";
00044     const CASCADE    = "CASCADE";
00045     const RESTRICT   = "RESTRICT";
00046     const SETDEFAULT = "SET DEFAULT";
00047     const SETNULL    = "SET NULL";
00048 
00052     function __construct($name, $vendorInfo = array())
00053     {
00054         $this->name = $name;
00055         $this->vendorSpecificInfo = $vendorInfo;
00056     }
00057 
00062     public function getName()
00063     {
00064         return $this->name;
00065     }
00066 
00072     public function addReference(ColumnInfo $local, ColumnInfo $foreign, $onDelete = self::NONE, $onUpdate = self::NONE)
00073     {
00074         $this->references[] = array($local, $foreign, $onDelete, $onUpdate);
00075     }
00076 
00081     public function getReferences()
00082     {
00083         return $this->references;
00084     }
00085

00091     {

00093     }

00100         return $this->name;
00101     }
